title: Tired of waiting, want an answer now...
body:
Do I exist? Have I been forgotten by riots system?

My boarder just left and i never got ranked rewards or anything? why? I wan't answers, because I honesty have no idea why I didn't, I thought "maybe im in the last wave" but its definitely way past that time.

replies.body:
Your account was temp banned within the 3 months prior to the end of the season. This made the account ineligible for season rewards. See the FAQ here for more info:

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2015-ranked-season-draws-close

"Players banned for seven days or more in the three months prior to the end of the season (August 10) are ineligible for this yearâ€™s rewards."

I don't remember ever being banned though, the only time it could have happened was when i was on holiday :/ i went on a 3 week holiday between July 22 and August 11, but what reason would I have to be banned while im in another country :/. I also checked my email for any notifications and there was nothing. I am seriously confused at this point in time :/

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PLwUgpic,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-11-23T14:23:20.686+0000)
>
> I don't remember ever being banned though, the only time it could have happened was when i was on holiday :/ i went on a 3 week holiday between July 22 and August 11, but what reason would I have to be banned while im in another country :/. I also checked my email for any notifications and there was nothing. I am seriously confused at this point in time :/

Quite often emails from riot end up in the junk folder rather than inbox. It's more than possible you missed it due to this?
checked every single part of my email; Bin, Spam, Junk, Inbox and just to make sure, the all mail

> [{quoted}](name=mutley,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PLwUgpic,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-22T05:55:50.043+0000)
>
> Send them a support ticket.

Do that ^^............

If you've been banned in the last 6 months (I'm not sure if chat restrictions count, I believe they do) then I'm pretty sure you won't get rewards. There was some thing about them relaxing the system for those without current bans/restrictions but I don't remember exactly what it was. Otherwise, put in a support ticket.
Did you get banned at all dude? What rank did you hit?
